channel.title: Please read ;) i need some help ;) 317
channel.description: do you guys know how i can make a single npc drop like from itemid 1 to like 8000 ? i would be glad if anyone could help me ;)

item.title: Please read ;) i need some help ;) 317
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

Well, you can do it in your npchandler or npcassistant class or w/e class handles your npc depending on your source, whatever class handles npc deaths

at the top of the class add this import with the others

then declare

Random randomGenerator = new Random(); int RandomNpcDrop = randomGenerator.nextInt(8000);
then in your npc death method (probably easiest if you search for where it handles jads death, so just search jads npc id)

put something like (exmaple for PI)

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { c.getItems().CreateGroundItem(c, RandomNpcDrop, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); }

And if client c is unrecognized, under the {
add Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];

Change #### to your npcid

Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Please read ;) i need some help ;) 317
